[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I marked the boundary line with a pen on the wall so that we can both be clear about where my property ends and your property begins.
Oh, okay. I didn't realize there was any confusion about that.
Well, I just wanted to make sure we're on the same page. I don't want any misunderstandings in the future.

I was promoted to manager a few months ago and I'm still trying to adjust to the new responsibilities. ### Neighbors B: That can definitely be tough. But remember, you're capable of handling it. ### Neighbors A: Thank you for saying that. I also try to work out every morning to relieve some stress, but even that has become difficult to maintain lately. ### Neighbors B: Maybe we can work out together sometime and make it more enjoyable for both of us. ### Neighbors A: That's a great idea! Thank you so much for being understanding and supportive.' }
